#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{  int t,sum,i,b;
   string a;
   cin>>t;
   while(t>0)
   { sum=0;
     cout<<endl;
     cin>>a;
     for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
     {  if(((int)a.at(i)>=49)&&((int)a.at(i)<=57))
        { b=a.at(i)-48; 
          sum+=b;
        }
     }
     cout<<sum;
   t--;
   }
	return 0;
}
